name: Warzard
description:
Warzard is my entry to the Godot Wild Jam 51.

It's a simplistic strategy game, with a charming retro style where you have to defeat the opposing wizard by upgrading your units or using magic.

Made using these public resources:

  • Kenny  1-Bit Pack
  • Joth - 8-Bit Bossa Nova
  • pend00 - CRT Shader
  • Incompetech
